sold out.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a concert, performance etc is sold out, all the tickets for that show have been sold
sold out.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The group will play three sold-out shows at Wembley Stadium.
sold out.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if a shop or store is sold out of a particular product, it has sold all of that product
sold out.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The store was completely sold out of tuna fish.
